column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////What a great place ! Every dish we had was excellent. We ordered the bone marrow
column2: wedge salad and garlic shrimp to start. Portions are generous! I love the BYOB rule they have
column3: as long as you share a glass with a neighboring table they waive the $50 corkage fee. For Steaks
column5: NY Strip and the ribeye all were great !
